data.title: Popular Christian author and minister Tim LaHaye passes away at age 90
data.meta_description: Dr. Tim LaHaye, a popular evangelical leader, and co-author of the Left Behind series, died Monday morning at the age of 90.LaHaye is most well-known for the best-selling Left Behind novels, which he wrote with Jerry B. Jenkins. In a statement released onl
data.text:
Dr. Tim LaHaye, a popular evangelical leader, and co-author of the Left Behind series, died Monday morning at the age of 90.

LaHaye is most well-known for the best-selling Left Behind novels, which he wrote with Jerry B. Jenkins. In a statement released online, Tim LaHaye Ministries said he died in a San Diego area hospital just days after suffering a stroke.

Dr. LaHaye also was the pastor at several churches and founded a systen of Christian schools and what is now San Diego Christian College. The first Left Behind novel was released in 1995, and the series has since gone on to sell more than 80 million copies.
